EmailTemplate.name: Turbonomic Re-introduction (1494853307.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic Re-introduction (1494853307.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Brian, After looking at past notes, it looks like you and the team at Volusia County had reviewed Turbonomic (formally VMTurbo) back in 2015 and we were able to help out in the following areas: · Alleviating constrained resources – preventing the risk of slowness for each application all in real time. · Realize the true capacity of the underlying infrastructure allowing you to defer hardware out of the infrastructure. · Creating proper capacity planning scenarios within the environment so that you and the team can onboard workloads properly, as well as not over spend on hardware. It seems that last time we were engaged in a demonstration, there was interest but the timing was off due to other projects going on but was hoping that we could reconnect over the next couple of weeks to provide a reintroduction. Below is a video discussing the new technical partnership between BMC and Turbonomic that I think you’ll find interesting. Cloud Economics with BMC | A Turbonomic Success Story <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE5YdMHJKVxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhcAk%2DhTzTtlKmUf4xCfLFh%5FNdo66m2lmMKp5uXm1iRWQkLWGV%2DZVuwXYpwghXJKalxUwi3zlKTGJ0nxCo%5Fo60G8Z6gTYSdql6620%5Fo2wCUGGVUsPjJ00iSKKxzoeRQtnh20UkKStmjzS%5FukYUomHUC%2DNkltBU%5F79J4DZpuxymQXHazvY71afxUepinlLD%2Dr8R7NkoGo7d%5FeGP7P1m%2DVp6ZTg9kyEHVgjMQH2pXKz8DOOR%5Ftjmim25gVMk7QhiekStxkXkj4qRT96qothamPH%5FrCHXzoh2N0QuIA9A7kUbDmNIV4hDgCw7vyMFza3L0BPPsjlS0YcnUvnIVE6EPG4Y%2C/j01QeM3JL1lNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpwMot1l1scencd1fmjNZeD90xaeaLBU8VEJ9vzwFRGfPYc44N6udYBgy9SnbwhqeXeIRaeflnydNj8Kaq1WkG59%2DPkROTBEQaf2Vjb1vPcYoBrwftE5UvVzuX9lmUcNUBmSE6h5EKxZmxd5W113rlp2bV%5FT3WE0Nz6JKYwGmvFbBfvP4As3QjrQMCOLPS]]> How does your calendar look over the next couple of weeks for a quick 30 minute discussion? Best regards, James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[https://turbonomic.com/product/#lower-infrastructure-costs]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:james.wilcox@turbonomic.com]]>
